project.name: fxa-js-client
project.description: Web client that talks to the Firefox Accounts API server

hkdf - The HMAC-based Key Derivation Function
based on https://github.com/mozilla/node-hkdf

params.description: Length of the derived key in bytes

return.description: promise object- It will resolve with `output` data

props.name: retrying
props.description: Flag indicating if the request is a retry

props.name: headers
props.description: A set of extra headers to add to the request

return.description: A promise that will be fulfilled with JSON `xhr.responseText` of the request

props.name: keys
props.description: If `true`, calls the API with `?keys=true` to get the keyFetchToken

props.name: service
props.description: Opaque alphanumeric token to be included in verification links

props.name: redirectTo
props.description: a URL that the client should be redirected to after handling the request

props.name: preVerified
props.description: set email to be verified if possible

props.name: preVerifyToken
props.description: Opaque alphanumeric token that can be used to pre-verify a user.

props.name: resume
props.description:
Opaque url-encoded string that will be included in the verification link
  as a querystring parameter, useful for continuing an OAuth flow for
  example.

props.name: lang
props.description: set the language for the 'Accept-Language' header

props.name: flowId
props.description: identifier for the current event flow

return.description: A promise that will be fulfilled with JSON `xhr.responseText` of the request

props.description: If `true`, calls the API with `?keys=true` to get the keyFetchToken

props.name: skipCaseError

Reason for sign in. Can be one of: `signin`, `password_check`,

Re-sends a verification code to the account's recovery email address.
HAWK-authenticated with the passwordForgotToken.
classitems.name: passwordForgotResendCode

props.name: service
props.description: Opaque alphanumeric token to be included in verification links

props.name: redirectTo
props.description: a URL that the client should be redirected to after handling the request

props.name: resume
props.description:
Opaque url-encoded string that will be included in the verification link
  as a querystring parameter, useful for continuing an OAuth flow for
  example.

props.description: set the language for the 'Accept-Language' header

return.description: A promise that will be fulfilled with JSON `xhr.responseText` of the request

classitems.description:
Submits the verification token to the server.
The API returns accountResetToken to the client.
HAWK-authenticated with the passwordForgotToken.
classitems.name: passwordForgotVerifyCode

return.description: A promise that will be fulfilled with JSON `xhr.responseText` of the request

classitems.description:
Returns the status for the passwordForgotToken.
If the request returns a success response, the token has not yet been consumed.
classitems.name: passwordForgotStatus

return.description: A promise that will be fulfilled with JSON `xhr.responseText` of the request

classitems.description:
The API returns reset result to the client.
HAWK-authenticated with accountResetToken
classitems.name: accountReset

props.name: keys
props.description:
If `true`, a new `keyFetchToken` is provisioned. `options.sessionToken`
  is required if `options.keys` is true.

props.name: flowId
props.description: identifier for the current event flow

return.description: A promise that will be fulfilled with JSON `xhr.responseText` of the request

classitems.description: Get the base16 bundle of encrypted kA|wrapKb.
classitems.name: accountKeys

return.description: A promise that will be fulfilled with JSON of {kA, kB}  of the key bundle

classitems.description: This deletes the account completely. All stored data is erased.

classitems.description: Change the password from one known value to another.
classitems.name: passwordChange

props.name: keys
props.description: If `true`, calls the API with `?keys=true` to get a new keyFetchToken

props.name: sessionToken
props.description:
If a `sessionToken` is passed, a new sessionToken will be returned
  with the same `verified` status as the existing sessionToken.

return.description: A promise that will be fulfilled with JSON `xhr.responseText` of the request

classitems.description: First step to change the password.
classitems.name: passwordChangeStart

props.name: skipCaseError
props.description: If `true`, the request will skip the incorrect case error

return.description: A promise that will be fulfilled with JSON of `xhr.responseText` and `oldUnwrapBKey`

classitems.description: Second step to change the password.
classitems.name: _passwordChangeKeys

params.name: oldCreds
params.description: This object should consists of `oldUnwrapBKey`, `keyFetchToken` and `passwordChangeToken`.

return.description: A promise that will be fulfilled with JSON of `xhr.responseText`

classitems.description: Third step to change the password.
classitems.name: _passwordChangeFinish

params.name: oldCreds
params.description: This object should consists of `oldUnwrapBKey`, `keyFetchToken` and `passwordChangeToken`.

params.name: keys
params.description: This object should contain the unbundled keys

props.name: keys
props.description: If `true`, calls the API with `?keys=true` to get the keyFetchToken

props.name: sessionToken
props.description:
If a `sessionToken` is passed, a new sessionToken will be returned
  with the same `verified` status as the existing sessionToken.

return.description: A promise that will be fulfilled with JSON of `xhr.responseText`

classitems.description: Get 32 bytes of random data. This should be combined with locally-sourced entropy when creating salts, etc.
classitems.name: getRandomBytes

return.description: A promise that will be fulfilled with JSON `xhr.responseText` of the request

classitems.description: Lock an account - only available in a testing environment.
classitems.name: accountLock

classitems.description: Verify an account unlock code
classitems.name: accountUnlockVerifyCode
